text: An administrative centre is sometimes used in some countries to refer to a county town, or other seat of regional/local government, or the place where the central administration of a commune is located. ==Related pages== *Chef- lieu, administrative centres in Algeria, Belgium, Luxembourg, France, Switzerland, and Tunisia. *County seat, administrative centres in the United States. *County town, administrative centres in Ireland and the United Kingdom. Category:Local government Category:Regions Category:Types of settlements
title: Administrative centre
